attributes.action:
A right to life.
Don't suspend life dependant treatments
(in favour of covid)
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly, I am one of those patients waiting for life saving treatment, I'm in my 30's & definitely not ready to die! 

The NHS are doing an amazing job, however Covid, bed capacity & staffing, amongst other issues are impacting the lives of non-Covid patients. We are hearing many sad stories of life saving Transplants cancelled, Cancer treatments postponed & other critical services on hold. People are dying needlessly.  Non-covid patients are just as important, more lives can & should be saved.
attributes.background: We must remember that both Covid & non-Covid patients are equally as important. Thousands of non-Covid life saving procedures have been cancelled due to resources being redirected to treating Coronavirus. Cancellations include Transplants & Cancer treatments. This is causing many avoidable deaths.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ensure speedy access to diagnostics and treatment for non-covid patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549642

Ensure access to treatment and screening for all cancer patients during Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552734
